posts.post_title: F/S Old Judge N172 Tom Deasley SGC 10 $120 or BO
posts.post_content: Old Judge Tom Deasley graded SGC 10. Heavy crease horizontally across middle and some light blue pen on front. Image is very clear with hardly any fading. Free shipping.
Price reduced to $95 plus $5 shipping/insurance. Last reduction.
